data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who are far from you in Corse-du-Sud. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Corse-du-Sud, Corse, France
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Corse-du-Sud, Corse, France that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Corse-du-Sud, Corse, France.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Corse-du-Sud, Corse, France honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Bonifacio
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Bonifacio, Corse, France.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Corse-du-Sud, Corse, France from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Corse-du-Sud that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 87,875 people in the county of Corse-du-Sud who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
